mapper.select: select pet_no as petNo, member_no as memberNo, pet_type as petType, pet_name as petName, pet_gender as petGender, pet_bdate as petBdate, pet_kind as petKind, pet_weight as petWeight, pet_neut as petNeut, pet_hospital as petHospital, pet_note as petNote, pet_filename as petFilename, pet_filepath as petFilepath from pet_tbl where member_no=#{memberNo}
